root.name: Heavy Fire: Special Operations
root.description: MISSIONS Mission 1: Armored Car PatrolTake aim from a vehicle's machine gun.Mission 2: EvacuationEscape an ambush under the enemies' fire.Mission 3: Helicopter AssaultShoot when flying a helicopter.Mission 4: Street SweepPatrol the Mogadish streets.Mission 5: High StakesProtect a square in front of the palace.Mission 6: The PalaceBreak through the enemy's line - the ultimate fight.
